overview.title: Overview
overview.description: These Delivery Terms explain how we process, ship and deliver your orders, including expected timelines, fees and responsibilities.

shippingOptions.title: Shipping Options
shippingOptions.description: Available options are displayed at checkout and may include:

options.standard: Standard shipping with estimated timelines by region.
options.pickup: Store pickup or local courier (if available in your area).

items.typical: Orders are typically processed within 1â€“2 business days after payment confirmation.
items.weekends: Orders placed on weekends or holidays are processed on the next business day.
items.preorder: Pre-order items ship based on estimated availability shown at purchase.

deliveryTimeframes.title: Delivery Timeframes
deliveryTimeframes.description: Estimated delivery times vary by destination and selected method. Tracking details are provided when the order ships. Actual delivery times may vary due to carrier capacity or local customs procedures.

items.costs: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on destination and service level.
items.duties: Import duties, taxes or brokerage fees may apply for international shipments and are the recipient's responsibility.
items.promotional: Promotional free shipping offers apply only as stated in the promotion.

items.delays: We are not responsible for delays caused by carriers, weather conditions or customs inspections.
items.damage: Please inspect packages upon delivery and report visible damage to the carrier and our support team within 48 hours.
items.loss: If a shipment is lost, contact us with your order number; we will coordinate with the carrier to resolve the issue.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For shipping questions or special handling requests, contact us at
